title: Ennamma Kannu Sowkiyama Lyrics Mr Barath
stanzas:
ennamaa kannu
sollamaa kannu

ennamaa kannu
sollamaa kannu
ennamaa kannu
sowkiyamaa
aamammaa kannu
sowkiyamthaan

ada ennamaa kannu
sowkiyamaa
aamammaa kannu
sowkiyamthaan

yaanaikkum chinna
poonai potiyaa
thuniju modhithaan
pattaa paadu paathiyaa

yaarukkum anjidaatha
singamthaan
urasi paarunga
mangidaatha thangamthaan

ennamaa kannu
sowkiyamaa
aamammaa kannu
sowkiyamthaan (2)

velli panam ennidathil
kottikidakku
vetti payal unnidathil
enna irukku.

sathiyatha pesukindra
nenjam irukku
uththamana nee irundhaa
meesai murukku.

sathiyatha nambi ..
laabam illa thambi..
nichchayamaa needhi
vellum oru thaedhi.

unnaalathaan aagaathu vegaathu
konjamthaane vendhirukku
michcham vegattum.

ennamaa kannu
sowkiyamaa
aamammaa kannu
sowkiyamthaan

eppavum naan vachcha kuri
thappiyathilla.
ennudaiya sollai yaarum
thattiyathilla

innoruvan enna vandhu
thottadhum illa
thottavana thappikka naan
vittadhum illa.

meesaiyila mannu
ottunatha ennu.
paayum puli naanthaan
paakka pora neethaan.

summaa thaan poochaandi
ye kaattaadhe.
namma kitta poduriye
thappu thaalam thaan.

ennamaa kannu
sollamaa kannu

ennamaa kannu
sowkiyamaa
aamammaa kannu
sowkiyamthaan (2)

yaanaikkum chinna
poonai potiyaa
thuniju modhithaan
pattaa paadu paathiyaa

yaarukkum anjidaatha
singamthaan
urasi paarunga
mangidaatha thangamthaan

ennamaa kannu
sowkiyamaa
aamammaa kannu
sowkiyamthaan
